effects: Physical damage (1.6x, ATK) to all enemies
Inflict Poison, Blind, Sleep and Silence (30%) on all enemies
name: Status Reels
Status Reels
狀態轉軸
스테이터스 릴
Altérations
Statusball
Ruleta de estados
desc_short: Damage and randomly poison, blind, put to sleep, silence, petrify, and reduce ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR for all enemies
攻擊全體敵人+隨機降低中毒失明睡眠沉默石化、降低攻擊防禦精神的數值
적 전체에 피해+무작위로 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 석화 부여+공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 감소
Dégâts et inflige aléatoirement poi., céc., som., sil., pétri. Et réduit ATT/DEF/MAGIE/PSY de tous les ennemis
Schadet allen Gegnern und fügt zuf. Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Schweigen, Stein zu und ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY runter, alle Gegner.
Daña e inflige al azar ven, ceg, sue, sil, pie y reduce ATQ/DEF/MAG/ESP de todos los enemigos
desc_long: Damages and randomly poisons, blinds, puts to sleep, silences, petrifies, and reduces ATK, DEF, MAG, and SPR for all enemies.
攻擊全體敵人，並隨機降低中毒失明睡眠沉默石化、降低攻擊防禦精神的數值。
적 전체에 피해를 주고, 무작위로 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 석화를 부여하며, 공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력을 감소시킵니다.
Inflige des dégâts et inflige aléatoirement poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, pétrification et réduit l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY de tous les ennemis.
Schadet allen Gegnern und fügt zuf. Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Schweigen, Stein zu und ANG, ABW, MAG und PSY runter, alle Gegner
Daña e inflige al azar veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, piedra y reduce el ATQ, la DEF, la MAG y el ESP de todos los enemigos.
